title: How to Equip a Heavy Weapon in Destiny

steps.headline: Play the game, and level up.
steps.description: Eventually, you will unlock and/or find some heavy weapons.

steps.headline: Once you have a heavy weapon, go to your character menu.
steps.description: Go to Heavy Weapons, and select the one you want to use.

steps.headline: In the middle of a map or level, press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to equip your heavy weapon.

text: Play the game, and level up. Eventually, you will unlock and/or find some heavy weapons. Once you have a heavy weapon, go to your character menu. Go to Heavy Weapons, and select the one you want to use. In the middle of a map or level, press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to equip your heavy weapon.
